en.aboutMe:
I'm Lucy. I have about four years of programming experience, with around three years full-stack development and one year dedicated to frontend development. In the past, I have participated in several team projects as well as worked independently.

I am someone who enjoys challenging myself and finds great satisfaction in solving problems. When faced with technical issues, I strive to find solutions. Despite the presence of pressure, the sense of accomplishment I feel upon finding a solution is indescribable.

Although my experience may not be extensive, I am constantly seeking self-improvement. I aspire to grow through various challenges, both in terms of programming skills and quality.

zh-TW.aboutMe:
我是Lucy，一名有四年左右的程式開發經驗的前端工程師，⼤概三年左右的全端，近一年則專注於前端開發，在過去曾參與了多個團隊合作的專案，同時也有獨立開發的經驗，相較於後端，我更喜歡前端開發的工作，由於我有後端經驗，所以可以更快的發現問題所在。

我是一個很喜歡挑戰新事物的人，對於解決問題時所獲得的成就感會感到非常滿足。在面對技術上的問題，儘管會有點壓力，但當我想辦法找到解決方法時，那種成就感是無法言喻的。

儘管我的經驗還不算很豐富，但我始終期望不斷增進自己，在各種挑戰中成長，不論是在程式技術方面還是在品質上。
